process_list: The appropriate use case, corporate objectives, and market segment are examined to ascertain the implementation framework.
Currently, we are designing a chatbot's flow. Give your bot a voice and an identity, and create dialogue sequences.
Using RA technology, we educated the chatbot using the data that your company has already gathered through a variety of sources.
We send several queries to the chatbot to elicit varied responses from it, so we can test its behaviour throughout the conversation flow.
To enhance the customer experience, we install an intelligent bot on the customer's hosting account, which examines user data and chat logs.
